description: The ASMxBUR_1B Product contains magnetic scalar data at 250 Hz rate. The ASM data are processed and provided at ASM instrument time stamp.
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,UTC,Time of observation,1,CDF_EPOCH
TimeFrac,ns,Fractional time of observation: ns within second,1,CDF_UINT4
Latitude,deg,Position in ITRF - Latitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,deg,Position in ITRF - Longitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,m,Position in ITRF - Radius,1,CDF_DOUBLE
F,nT,Magnetic field intensity,1,CDF_DOUBLE
dF_Stray,nT,Magnetic stray fields correction,1, CDF_DOUBLE
dF_BlochSiegert,nT,Bloch-Siegert correction,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Flags,-,"Binary combination of the values taken by Flag_outlier, Flag_magnetic_condition, Flag_heater and Flag_step",1,CDF_UINT1
Time_piezo, UTC, Timestamp of ASM motor activations, 1, CDF_EPOCH
related_resources:
ASM Burst Product Documentation:

The ASM Burst Product Definition Document and the list if available products can be found here or via ftp under the following folder:

ftp://swarm-diss.eo.esa.int/Advanced/Magnetic_Data/ASM_Burst_Mode_Data/Documentation

Level 1B Product Format page:

  • Swarm Level 1B Product Format
details:
Flags is stored as a 8 bits unsigned integer and can nominally take values from 0 to 15. This number can be written in a binary form such as Flags = '0000abcd', where:

  • ‘a’ stands for Flag_outlier value,
  • ‘b’ stands for Flag_magnetic_condition value,
  • ‘c’ stands for Flag_heater value,
  • ‘d’ stands for Flag_step value.
